channel.title: Whe want runescape 2012 back! <team needed>
channel.description:
hello mopariens, as you can read on the topic, im about to going to try to duplicate runescape 2012. you might say <its about time> <good luck you never make it>, its gonna be a big project than im want to work on the next vacation. So whe can enjoiy runescape best time ever <Old school was good tho>
Team Ofcourse i need a team:
java coder <can you code commands,items,servers than you are my man> in game editor <Can you edit shops><or ncpc talking><shop ncp talking to him><ncpc spawn> Qeust <OFCOURSE whe need some qeusts not all, atleast some qeust needed> Items <can you make some items work <like dye on bow etc cristmas crackers> Events <can you make events work?> this is simply a beginning of coders/easy stuff i can do my self, but i need team, so im not 24/7 at my pc .
[size=18pt]Do you wanna join?[/size] if you wanna join this major project, contact me on skype danny.overesch that is my skype
greetings and hope to get some positif reactions, regards danny

item.title: Whe want runescape 2012 back! <team needed>
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“zeropointx, post:11, topic:520263”][quote author=south-park link=topic=638762.msg4306713#msg4306713 date=1369966057]

he won’t succeed.

Took the words out of my mouth. I doubt this will get anywhere, I mean we barley just BARLEY did this to RuneScape in 2006 which took 2+ years. I am guessing this would take at LEAST 4-5 years, meaning a full remake. Also I would suggest using ‘(’ instead of ‘<’.
[/quote]
With this speed we are not talking about 5 years. If you think how much content there is, not just minigames but how many quests, how many npcs, how much everything doing ALL OF THAT would take about 15 years. And yet it wouldn’t be as good as 2012 rs. 100% remakes are always bad idea in my mind since it takes so much time and it pretty much impossible to make it really look like 2012 no matter how good coder you would be.[/quote]

True

Read full topic

item.title: Whe want runescape 2012 back! <team needed>
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:7, topic:520263”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=638762.msg4305687#msg4305687 date=1369760490]
he won’t succeed.
[/quote]
Took the words out of my mouth. I doubt this will get anywhere, I mean we barley just BARLEY did this to RuneScape in 2006 which took 2+ years. I am guessing this would take at LEAST 4-5 years, meaning a full remake. Also I would suggest using ‘(’ instead of ‘<’.[/quote]
With this speed we are not talking about 5 years. If you think how much content there is, not just minigames but how many quests, how many npcs, how much everything doing ALL OF THAT would take about 15 years. And yet it wouldn’t be as good as 2012 rs. 100% remakes are always bad idea in my mind since it takes so much time and it pretty much impossible to make it really look like 2012 no matter how good coder you would be.

Read full topic
